title: Event 1
longDescription: The U.S. Department of Labor’s Children’s Bureau releases a report suggesting sex education during school could have better protected soldiers from STIs.

title: Event 2
longDescription: Ella Flagg Young, the superintendent of Chicago Public Schools was the first to attempt implementing a city-wide sex-hygiene program in secondary schools

title: Event 3
longDescription: The global pandemic of HIV/AIDS begins, it is an ongoing worldwide public health issue.
